case.title: Iso new dude - 40 (Financial District)
case.text: The ex and me just did splitsville. maybe I'm out of line or some Of you men might call me a gold digger, let me state that we always went 50/50 On everything. I paid a higher proportion of rent bc I made a bit more than him. When we went to his friend's weddings or family weddings I still paid for my half Of the hotel, you get the idea. In the four years together never a piece of jewelry except a 50 dollar necklace, he wouldn't get married bc he wouldnt sign a prenup so I decided to be ok with it and settle for cohabitation. Anyway got a 70 buck bra set for my bday after five years together and just got annoyed. I'm 40 he's 37. I'm done. Looking for a new guy to just start out with friendship first, no kids here. Brunette. Good shape, five five middle eatstern usa born pediatrician
